---
title: "Calluna data cleaning"
output: html_notebook
---


Load the Durin + DroughtNet data.

```{r}
data <- read_csv("vegetation/DURIN_clean.csv")

```

filter the data to Durin plots only
```{r}
durin  <-data %>% filter(DURIN_plot, habitat)
```


species count (number of Calluna plants) per plot
```{r}
species_count_plot <- durin %>%
  filter(species == "Calluna vulgaris") %>%
  group_by(DURIN_plot) %>%
  summarise(number_plants = n())
```


check if species(CV) have multiple heights,
group by the plant identifier, count the unique heights, and then keep only plants with more than one height
```{r}
library(dplyr)
plants_multiple_heights <- durin %>%
  filter(species == "Callina vulgaris") %>%
group_by(envelope_ID) %>%
  mutate(number_unique_heights = n_distinct(height))
  filter(number_unique_heights>1)
```
